00020 #ifndef _GRDFILEWRITER_H_
00021 #define _GRDFILEWRITER_H_
00022 
00023 /*! \file GRDFileWriter.h This file provides GRD file writing capabilities.
00024  */
00025 
00026 #include "file/GRDFileData.h"
00027 //
00028 #include <fstream>
00029 //
00030 
00031 namespace affxgrd
00032 {
00033 
00034 /*! This class provides methods to write a GRD file. */
00035 class CGRDFileWriter : public CGRDFileData
00036 {
00037 public:
00038 
00039         /*! Creates the file set in SetFileName and writes the header. 
00040          *      @return Returns true if the file was successfully created and the header was successfully written.
00041          */
00042         bool CreateNewFile();
00043 
00044         /*! Writes a center coordinate to an newly created GRD file.  May only be called after a successful call to CreateNewFile.
00045          *      @return Returns true if the center coordinate was successfully written.
00046          */
00047         bool WriteCenter(const FCOORD& center);
00048 
00049         /*! Closes the newly created file.
00050          *      @return Returns true if the new file was successfully closed.
00051          */
00052         bool CloseNewFile();
00053 
00054 protected:
00055 
00056         /*! Writes the header to the open file.
00057          *      @return Returns true if the header was sucessfully written.
00058          */
00059         bool WriteHeader();
00060 
00061         /*! Writes the fixed section of the file header to the open file.
00062          *      @return Returns true if the fixed header was successfully written.
00063          */
00064         bool WriteFixedHeader();
00065 
00066         /*! Writes the tag header of the file header to the open file.
00067          *      @return Returns true if the tag header was successfully written.
00068          */
00069         bool WriteTagHeader();
00070 
00071         /*! Writes the optimized subgrid coordinates header of the file header to the open file.
00072          *      @return Returns true if the optimized subgrid coordinates header was successfully written.
00073          */
00074         bool WriteOptimumCorners();
00075 
00076 protected:
00077 
00078         /*! stream for writing files */
00079         std::ofstream m_outstr;
00080 };
00081 
00082 }
00083
